title: Ponmeni Uruguthe  Lyrics Moondram Pirai
stanzas:
Ponmeni urugudhe
ennaasai peruguthe
yedhedho ninaivu thonudhe
engaeyo idhayam pogudhe
panikaatrile thananaa
nananaa...nananaa (2)

Ilamai idhu yaengum vayadhu
iru vizhiyum thoongaadhu
inimai sugam vaangum mandhu
iniyum idhu thaangaadhu

ilam maeni vaaduthe
thanalaagave
ilangaatru veesuthe
analaagave
bathil illaiyo thananaa
nananaa...nananaa

Ponmeni urugudhe
ennaasai peruguthe
yedhedho ninaivu thonudhe
engaeyo idhayam pogudhe
panikaatrile thananaa
nananaa...nananaa

aruviyena aasai ezhundhu
anaikkum sugam paarkaadhu
urugum manam unnai ninaidhu
unarvugalai serkkaadho

unakkaaga yaengudhe
oru poo udal
uravaagum inbamo
iru paarkadal

Ponmeni urugudhe
ennaasai peruguthe
yedhedho ninaivu thonudhe
engaeyo idhayam pogudhe
panikaatrile thananaa
nananaa...nananaa
